label: 中井竹山
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1730-1804) Student of Goi Ranju and a teacher among merchant leaders in Osaka.  His critical perspective [of the Tokugawa regime] is best stated in his prescriptive opus Sōbō kigen. [五井蘭州、草茅危言]
